name: Flying Police Driver 3d Simulator
description:
Flying Police Driver Simulator

Do you love police car driving games. Want to drive and fly with a flying police car? Flying Police Car: San Andreas is perfect for you!

Get ready to the thrilling cop car driving experience! You can test your airplane pilot skills and car driving ability at the same time. Fly
your plane around the city try to chase down criminals, Drive your police car do stunts and drifts !
Flying Police Car: San Andreas is made for all fans of police games, free car driving games, Simulation games and Airplane Flight
games

This amazing flying car simulator will take you towards an action packed ride in the latest flying car racing games.

keyfeatures:

=> A real police car simulator in the sky
=> Improve Airplane Flight Ability
=> Muscle Cop Car Model
=> Stunning HD Graphics
=> No WiFi? No Problem.
=> Offline Play
